page.title: 07EDUCATION 2
page.content: SECONDARY EDUCATION. From the age of eleven all children living in Hanney and the surrounding villages have to move on to different areas to attend secondary schools. Parents can choose which schools to send their children. WANTAGE SCHOOL. The main choice that parents make is Wantage school, which is split into three Halls. These are Icknield Hall, Segsbury Hall and King Alfred's Hall. Most chidren from Hanney school go on to Icknield Hall. ABINGDON SCHOOLS. There are also secondary schools in Abingdon for which you have to sit an entrance examination or parents pay school fees.
